subject: Problem with simple test case
msgSnippet: Hello there, I have a simple hello world servlet and a test case for it as follows: public class HelloWorld extends HttpServlet { public void
messageBody:
Hello there,

I have a simple hello world servlet and a test case for it as
follows:

public class HelloWorld extends HttpServlet {
public void doGet(HttpServletRequest request,
HttpServletResponse response)
throws IOException, ServletException
{
response.setContentType("text/html");
PrintWriter out = response.getWriter();
out.println("<html>");
out.println("<head>");
//out.println("<title>Hello World!</title>");
out.println("</head>");
out.println("<body>");
out.println("<h1>Hello World!</h1>");
out.println("</body>");
out.println("</html>");
}
public void doPost(HttpServletRequest request,
HttpServletResponse response)
throws IOException, ServletException {
doGet(request, response);
}
}

*********************TEST CASE BEGIN*********************
public class HelloWorldTest extends ServletTestCase{

public void testDoGet() {
HelloWorld hw = new HelloWorld();
try {
hw.doGet(request,response);
}catch (Exception e) { }
}

public void endDoGet(WebResponse theResponse) {
String expected = "<html><head></head><body><h1>Hello World!
</h1></body></html>";
String actual = theResponse.getText();

assertEquals(expected,actual);
}
}
*********************TEST CASE END*********************

I configured my web.xml with the following servlet tags:

<servlet>
<servlet-name>ServletTestRunner</servlet-name>
<servlet-class>

org.apache.cactus.server.runner.ServletTestRunner
</servlet-class>
</servlet>

<servlet>
<servlet-name>ServletRedirector</servlet-name>
<servlet-
class>org.apache.cactus.server.ServletTestRedirector</servlet-class>
</servlet>

<servlet-mapping>
<servlet-name>ServletRedirector</servlet-name>
<url-pattern>/ServletRedirector</url-pattern>
</servlet-mapping>

<servlet-mapping>
<servlet-name>ServletTestRunner</servlet-name>
<url-pattern>/ServletTestRunner</url-pattern>
</servlet-mapping>

When I access this test case from the browser, using
http://localhost:8080/ServletTestRunner?suite=HelloWorldTest

I am getting the following error:

"Failed to get the test results at
[http://localhost:8080/ServletRedirector%5d"
type="org.apache.cactus.util.ChainedRuntimeException">org.apache.cact
us.util.ChainedRuntimeException: Failed to get the test results at
[http://localhost:8080/ServletRedirector%5d
at
org.apache.cactus.internal.client.connector.http.DefaultHttpClient.do
Test_aroundBody0(DefaultHttpClient.java:92)

Test(DefaultHttpClient.java)

runWebTest(HttpProtocolHandler.java:159)

Could you please help me resolve the issue? I am sure there must be
some configuration issue that I'm not familiar with.

Thanks in advance,
Nalini.
